quote: The more you know, the more you know you don't know.
Life a series of rooms and who we get stuck in those rooms with adds up to what our lives are.
I see now that the circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
source: Mewtwo in <cite title='Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back'>Pokémon: The First Movie</cite>

quote: Get busy living, or get busy dying.
source: Morgan Freeman in <cite title='Shawshank Redemption'>Shawshank Redemption</cite>

quote: What Does Marcellus Wallace Look Like?
source: Samuel L. Jackson in <cite title='Pulp Fiction'>Pulp Fiction</cite>

quote: You Can't Always Get What You Want.
source: Mick Jagger <cite title='You Can't Always Get What You Want'>You Can't Always Get What You Want </cite>

quote: The ability to speak does not make you intelligent.
source: Qui-Gon Jinn <cite title='Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace'>Star Wars: Episode I</cite>

quote: Heroes get remembered, but legends never die.
With great power comes great responsibility.
Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
source: Tom Hanks in <cite title='Forrest Gump'>Forrest Gump</cite>

quote: You take the blue pill, the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill, you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes.
Proximity to power deludes some into thinking they wield it.
source: Frank Underwood  <cite title='House of Cards'>House of Cards</cite>

quote: Ambition can be misread as impatience.
Except for the things we did wrong, we did everything right.
